text:
@bbchealth @GavinNewsom @realDonaldTrump 
why don’t we block all travel in and out of China to the United States until this is all figured out. It’s not worth the risk. Someone tell me why most of this stuff starts in China or does it just seem that way? #COVID19 #Pandemic #China #Virus
